name: Scarlet Ibis
description: The Scarlet Ibis is a medium-sized monstrosity adorned with sharp features and vibrant plumage. Its beak and talons are designed for both attack and inflicting debilitating curses.
memorable: Its ability to inflict permanent curses upon death makes the Scarlet Ibis a uniquely dangerous foe.
goals: To inflict curses on its enemies and maintain its own survival in combat.
relations: May be found alongside other cursed or monstrous creatures and could serve as a guardian or a solo threat.
environment: Typically encountered in areas rich in magic or mysticism where curses are common.
strengths: Combines physical attacks with debilitating curse abilities, providing both offensive and defensive capabilities.
weaknesses: Relying on curses makes it highly dependent on maintaining an effective combat strategy against enemies.
attacks: Uses a multiattack feature with a beak strike that curses its target, and slashing attacks with its talons.
most_powerful_ability: Death Curse, which makes all inflicted curses permanent upon its death, affecting even the creatures that deal its killing blow.
skills: Possesses a strong Insight skill, making it good at reading opponents and situations.
additional_information: Has the ability to inflict disadvantage on cursed targets' rolls.
Cursing effects can also grant enemies advantage on attack rolls against cursed foes.
A solid flying speed allows for effective battlefield maneuvering.
test_queries: medium beast that casts death curses
bird that curses enemies in battle
